SEARCH
Package passport.roles.repositories

Interface Users

All Known Implementing Classes:
UsersInMemory, UsersJson
public interface Users
Interface for managing User entities.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<User>
    byId(UserId id)
    Retrieves an user by their ID.
    boolean
    has(EmailAddress email)
    Checks if an user exists by their email.
    List<User>
    list()
    Lists all users.
    Optional<User>
    ownerOf(Login login)
    Retrieves an user by their email and password.
    void
    register(User user)
    Registers a new user.
    void
    update(User target, User newUser)
    Updates an existing user.

  • Method Details

    • register

      void register(User user)
      Registers a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to be registered

    • update

      void update(User target, User newUser)
      Updates an existing user.
      Parameters:
      target - the user to be updated
      newUser - the new user information

    • byId

      Optional<User> byId(UserId id)
      Retrieves an user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the user if found, or empty if not found

    • ownerOf

      Optional<User> ownerOf(Login login)
      Retrieves an user by their email and password.
      Parameters:
      login - the login of the user
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the user if found, or empty if not found

    • has

      boolean has(EmailAddress email)
      Checks if an user exists by their email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user
      Returns:
      true if the user exists, false otherwise

    • list

      List<User> list()
      Lists all users.
      Returns:
      a list of all users
